{{main|2016 Wimbledon Championships}}

This was the first year that the wheelchair men's singles event was held at the [[Wimbledon Championships]].

[[Gordon Reid (tennis)|Gordon Reid]] won the title, defeating [[Stefan Olsson]] in the final, 6–1, 6–4.
